short_summary: 60 x Apple 16-inch MacBooks or equivalent, plus client options
description: The Department of National Defence requires 60 x Apple 16-inch MacBooks or equivalent plus client options, as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation. Delivery Destination Area: Ottawa, Ontario
full_summary:
# Solicitation for 16-inch MacBook Pro for the Department of National Defence
===============

## Solicitation Information

* Title: 16-inch MacBook Pro for the Department of National Defence
* Solicitation Number: SSC-23-00021573: T
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Closing Date: **2023-02-21T10:30:00**
* Publication Date: 2023-01-19
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region)

## Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Address:
	+ 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0B6
* Contact Information:
	+ Alyssa Brook, Procurement Officer
	+ Email: [alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: 343-548-0159

## Request for Quotation

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 60 x Apple 16-inch MacBooks or equivalent, plus client options. Delivery is required to Ottawa, Ontario. The delivery date is 30 federal government working days from contract award or by 31-Mar-2023, whichever is sooner.

## Security Requirements

* N/A

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Pre-Qualification Requirements

* Prospective suppliers must be pre-qualified in both English and French
* Suppliers must comply with the Procurement Integrity Rules

## Submission of Quotations

Quotations must be submitted electronically to [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)

**Note:** All enquiries related to this solicitation must be addressed in writing to the above-mentioned contact information. Special arrangements will be made for suppliers with disabilities.

**Important Dates:**

* Publication Date: 19 January 2023
* Solicitation Closing Date: 21 February 2023, 10:30:00
* Delivery Date: 30 federal government working days from contract award or by 31 March 2023

Suppliers who are interested in submitting a quotation should carefully review this solicitation and ensure they meet the pre-qualification requirements. They should also confirm that they can meet the delivery deadline.
